The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear parents,
There has been a slight change to the timing of Ballet sessions at the International School of Moscow. The dates below are the new dates for Ballet tuition for your children. Please make a note of the following important points:
-Foundation stage children will have their lesson from 4 – 4.45pm
-Years 1-3 children will have their lesson from 4.50 – 5.35pm
-You must have an adult to accompany your child in between sessions, teachers at the school will have no involvement in this.
-Money for the tuition needs to be handed to the reception desk at the lower campus.
-Children who sign up for the activity must commit to both a Monday and a Thursday session.
Monday 11th February Thursday 14th February Monday 18th February Thursday 21st February
Half term holiday – no children for 1 week
Monday 4th March Thursday 7th March Monday 11th March Thursday 14th March
If you have questions regarding the above, please contact the following: Mr. Egor Simachev – egoro@mail.ru
Kindest regards,
The PE department The International School of Moscow World Class Education
